    • Constructor Detail

      • FormattedTextLine

        public FormattedTextLine​(java.util.List<TextWord> words)
        Creates a formatted text line with the content of all words passed into this
        Parameters:
        words - The list of words. In general words may either contain text, or be separators which control spacing of words containing text
